channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republicans plow ahead on cuts to PBS and foreign aid
item.description: The Senate is plowing ahead Wednesday evening on $9 billion in cuts to PBS, NPR and foreign aid, threats from Democrats be damned. Why it matters: Dem...

item.title: Here are the 3rd-countries where the Trump administration is deporting migrants
item.description: Data: Axios research; Map: Erin Davis/Axios Visuals Expelling migrants to third-countries that are not their place of origin is becoming a cornerstone...

item.title: Reports: Maurene Comey, the Manhattan prosecutor who handled the Epstein case, is fired
item.description: Maurene Comey, the federal prosecutor who worked on both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal cases, was fired on Wednesday, multiple outl...

item.title: Federal judge delays ruling on Ábrego García's release pending trial
item.description: A federal judge on Wednesday delayed making a ruling on whether Kilmar Ábrego García should be released from jail as he awaits trial, multiple outlets...

item.title: Senate Democrats slam Israel in major shift of tone
item.description: Mainstream Senate Democrats are starting to echo their party's base, which has soured on supporting Israel . Zoom in: Sen. Elissa Slotkin (D-Mich.), a...

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s contract-cutting blitz rattles a once-flourishing DC industry
item.description: The General Services Administration, which oversees government contracting, is leading a review of more than 20,000 consulting agreements for what is ...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
